short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool designed to enhance student experience by simplifying timetable management and providing timely class notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension designed for IITK students to simplify timetable management from Pingala, IITK's Academic Management Portal, and providing timely class notifications.
